issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

If the Image Worker instance has been stopped (due to freeing up resources on the cloud), if a user tried to re-launch an instance store-backed paravirtual EMI, the Image Worker instance does not relaunch.   When this happens, the instance store-backed paravirt EMI is not launched:

*Instance not launching, and Disappearing*

{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-run-instances -t m1.xlarge -k euca-admin emi-8dd5bc8e
RESERVATION	r-1df6d540	009646256944	default
INSTANCE	i-673b93e3	emi-8dd5bc8e	0.0.0.0	0.0.0.0	pending	euca-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2014-05-08T19:12:37.864Z	RiseOfAnEmpire	eki-4060cef9	eri-978c5538		monitoring-disabled	0.0.0.0	0.0.0.0			instance-store					paravirtual			sg-c9cb9ed8
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-cfb5fc02	009646256944	default
INSTANCE	i-369eef8c	emi-d8e8e8a1	10.104.6.230	172.18.127.149	running	euca-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2014-05-08T19:10:41.211Z	RiseOfAnEmpire				monitoring-disabled	10.104.6.230	172.18.127.149			instance-store					hvm			sg-c9cb9ed8
TAG	instance	i-369eef8c	euca:node	10.105.1.188
RESERVATION	r-526688e9	009646256944	default
INSTANCE	i-fb4af950	emi-d8e8e8a1			terminated	euca-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2014-05-08T19:07:30.022Z	RiseOfAnEmpire				monitoring-disabled					instance-store					hvm			sg-c9cb9ed8
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-cfb5fc02	009646256944	default
INSTANCE	i-369eef8c	emi-d8e8e8a1	10.104.6.230	172.18.127.149	running	euca-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2014-05-08T19:10:41.211Z	RiseOfAnEmpire				monitoring-disabled	10.104.6.230	172.18.127.149			instance-store					hvm			sg-c9cb9ed8
TAG	instance	i-369eef8c	euca:node	10.105.1.188
RESERVATION	r-526688e9	009646256944	default
INSTANCE	i-fb4af950	emi-d8e8e8a1			terminated	euca-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2014-05-08T19:07:30.022Z	RiseOfAnEmpire				monitoring-disabled					instance-store					hvm			sg-c9cb9ed8
{code}

*Error in cloud logs*

{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# grep i-673b93e3 /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-*
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log:Thu May 8 12:12:46 2014  WARN [Allocations:Eucalyptus.cluster:ClusterConfiguration:arn:euca:eucalyptus:RiseOfAnEmpire:cluster:Moment/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#1307] [?.?(?):?] Aborting resource token: ResourceToken:i-673b93e3:resources=TypedContext:{com.eucalyptus.util.TypedKey(NetworkResources)=[com.eucalyptus.compute.common.network.PrivateNetworkIndexResource(1022), com.eucalyptus.compute.common.network.PublicIPResource()]}
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log:Thu May 8 12:12:47 2014 ERROR [ClusterAllocator:Eucalyptus.cluster:ClusterConfiguration:arn:euca:eucalyptus:RiseOfAnEmpire:cluster:Moment/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#1307] [?.?(?):?] java.util.NoSuchElementException: example: [VmInstance networkConfig=null vmId=null bootRecord=null usageStats=null launchRecord=null runtimeState=null transientVolumeState=null placement=null expiration=null privateNetwork=null networkGroups=[] networkGroupIds=[] networkIndex=null tags=null ownerUserId=null ownerUserName=null ownerAccountNumber=null uniqueName=null ownerFullNameCached=null state=null lastState=null stateChangeStack=null displayName=i-673b93e3 id=null version=null creationTimestamp=null lastUpdateTimestamp=null naturalId=null]
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-error.log:Thu May 8 12:12:47 2014 ERROR [ClusterAllocator:Eucalyptus.cluster:ClusterConfiguration:arn:euca:eucalyptus:RiseOfAnEmpire:cluster:Moment/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#1307] [com.eucalyptus.cloud.run.ClusterAllocator.cleanupOnFailure(ClusterAllocator.java):284] java.util.NoSuchElementException: example: [VmInstance networkConfig=null vmId=null bootRecord=null usageStats=null launchRecord=null runtimeState=null transientVolumeState=null placement=null expiration=null privateNetwork=null networkGroups=[] networkGroupIds=[] networkIndex=null tags=null ownerUserId=null ownerUserName=null ownerAccountNumber=null uniqueName=null ownerFullNameCached=null state=null lastState=null stateChangeStack=null displayName=i-673b93e3 id=null version=null creationTimestamp=null lastUpdateTimestamp=null naturalId=null]
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log:2014-05-08 12:12:46  WARN | Aborting resource token: ResourceToken:i-673b93e3:resources=TypedContext:{com.eucalyptus.util.TypedKey(NetworkResources)=[com.eucalyptus.compute.common.network.PrivateNetworkIndexResource(1022), com.eucalyptus.compute.common.network.PublicIPResource()]}
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log:2014-05-08 12:12:47 ERROR | java.util.NoSuchElementException: example: [VmInstance networkConfig=null vmId=null bootRecord=null usageStats=null launchRecord=null runtimeState=null transientVolumeState=null placement=null expiration=null privateNetwork=null networkGroups=[] networkGroupIds=[] networkIndex=null tags=null ownerUserId=null ownerUserName=null ownerAccountNumber=null uniqueName=null ownerFullNameCached=null state=null lastState=null stateChangeStack=null displayName=i-673b93e3 id=null version=null creationTimestamp=null lastUpdateTimestamp=null naturalId=null]
{code}

*Steps*

* Set up Eucalyptus 4.0 Cloud
{code}
eucalyptus-4.0.0-0.0.1000.20140507gitfd164b1b.el6.x86_64
{code}
* Install Image Worker Image
{code}
eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image-1.0.0-0.165.140507git9127d5a.el6.x86_64
{code}
* Upload, bundle and register instance store-backed paravirt EMI
* Launch the paravirt EMI
* After the Image Worker has been launched, and paravirt instance is in pending state
** terminate paravirt instance
** terminate Image Worker instance by modifying Image Worker autoscaling group
{code}
$ euscale-update-auto-scaling-group -M 0 -m 0 --desired-capacity 0 asg-euca-internal-imaging-worker-01
{code}
* After Image Worker instance is in 'terminated' state, relaunch instance store-backed paravirt EMI

*Pertinent Data*

After resetting the autoscaling group to >= 1, the Image Worker relaunched, and the instance store-backed paravirt launched just fine.
fields.summary: Image Worker Doesn't Re-Launch Once Its Been Terminated

comments.body:
Behavior is working as designed.  Created the following KB article:

* [Restarting Image Worker Instance After Forcing Image Worker Instance Termination|https://support.eucalyptus.com/hc/en-us/articles/201949954-Restarting-Image-Worker-Instance-After-Forcing-Image-Worker-Instance-Termination]
